params.shares: Amount of LP tokens to withdraw
Amount of LP tokens to redeem

addFees(uint256).notice: Add fees to the pool (from trading, borrow, liquidations)

convertToAssets(uint256).notice: Convert LP shares to USDC amount

convertToShares(uint256).notice: Convert USDC amount to LP shares

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposit USDC and receive LP tokens

pendingFeesOf(address).notice: Get pending fees for a user

recordLoss(uint256).notice: Record a loss (e.g., from bad debt)

sharePrice().notice: Get current share price (assets per share)

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Instant withdrawal for small amounts (if liquidity available)
